column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I've had two incredible dinners at Bavette's. The atmosphere is incredible - very cool
column2: speakeasy vibe that somehow still feels like an upscale steakhouse. The service is excellent
column4: but the best part is the food - it's really outstanding. It's not inexpensive
column5: but worth a visit for a special occasion. Reservations fill up fast
column6: so make sure to plan far in advance
column7: especially for a weekend. One of the best steakhouses in Chicago.
